member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONFIGURATION
member.summary: Describes the configuration for a video decoder.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONFIGURATION.DecodeProfile
member.summary: A GUID identifying the profile for the decoder, such as D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILE_H264 or D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILE_HEVC_MAIN. For a list of supported GUIDs, see Direct3D 12 Video GUIDs.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONFIGURATION.BitstreamEncryption
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the type of bitstream encryption. For no encryption, use D3D12_BITSTREAM_ENCRYPTION_TYPE_NONE.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONFIGURATION.InterlaceType
member.summary: A member of the enumeration the desired interlace type used by the coded frames.
